channel.title: portableapp on DB Browser for SQLite
channel.description: Recent content in portableapp on DB Browser for SQLite

item.title: PortableApp for 3.12.0 release now available
item.description: Thanks to Chris Locke and John T. Haller, the PortableApps installer for DB Browser for SQLite 3.12.0 is now available! :) https://download.sqlitebrowser.org/SQLiteDatabaseBrowserPortable_3.12.0_English.paf.exe

item.title: PortableApp for 3.11.2 release now available
item.description: Thanks to Chris Locke and John T. Haller, the PortableApps installer for DB Browser for SQLite 3.11.2 is now available! :) https://download.sqlitebrowser.org/SQLiteDatabaseBrowserPortable_3.11.2_English.paf.exe
